nodedef.name: USGSWaterWatchService
nodedef.attr: Retrieves USGS WaterWatch data for given region.

datadef.name: RegionCode
datadef.attr: The region code which is a two letter state abbreviation.

datadef.name: HUCodeMatch
datadef.attr: Hydrologic Unit Code prefix for data of interest.

datadef.name: SelectedFields
datadef.attr: Select the fields that should be reported.

datadef.name: DropRepeatReports
datadef.attr: If set, does not send reported values that were previously sent.

datadef.name: TriggerStartAndEnd
datadef.attr: If set an event trigger is sent to the next node in the flow to let it know when the retrieve was started and when it ended.
